ygData.subject: Re: Najah bites at Lady hawk
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawk looks up at Zardus What is the meaning of this outrage, I have done nothing to you to deserve this indignity. Zardus was smarter than she d given

Lady Hawk looks up at Zardus "What is the meaning of this outrage, I 
have done nothing to you to deserve this indignity." Zardus was 
smarter than she'd given him credit for. "I demand you release me 
this instant." she knew why she was being held, she didn't know what 
it was that Zardus knew. "I have two legs, I can walk on my own." She 
knew she'd picked the wrong time to escape. If Squizzy hadn't been so 
difficult they'd have been gone and free by now.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> "You have done nothing wrong," Zardus says to Najah, looking at 
Lady 
> Hawk carefully, "I merely want her alive."
> 
> He looks at the other Alliance troops. "Everyone go to the new 
base. 
> Havoc, take Squizzy with you. Put her in a CR, I will be there 
> shortly, with this femm."
> 
> He looks at Lady Hawk again.
> 
> "Najah, stay on her. Lady Hawk, I must request your presence at the 
> new base for a while. Repressor, help Najah take her."
> 
> Repressor steps forward to help Najah with Lady Hawk while Havoc 
> flies off, carrying Squizzy.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Najah:::
> > 
> > "Freeze birdie... haven't you heard him????" said
> > najah while he avioded the hit "I sssk you a gain
> > ssssir, what have I done wrong?"
